data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: You are welcome to contribute content that complies with our content policies and any applicable inclusion guidelines. However, please ____ not ____ re-create ____ page ____ the ____ content, or ____ the ____ deletion ____ from ____ page. You ____ contest ____ deletion ____ clicking ____ `` Contest this ____ deletion '' button ____ the ____ deletion ____. You may also wish to read our introduction to editing and guide to writing your first article.

data.fullContent: You are welcome to contribute content that complies with our content policies and any applicable inclusion guidelines. However, please do not simply re-create the page with the same content, or remove the speedy deletion tag from the page. You can contest the deletion by clicking the `` Contest this speedy deletion '' button inside the speedy deletion tag. You may also wish to read our introduction to editing and guide to writing your first article.
data.answer: 欢迎你贡献符合我们的内容政策和任何适用的包含指南的内容。但是，请不要简单地重新创建具有相同内容的页面，或删除快速删除标签从页面。你可以通过点击快速删除标签里面的“快速删除竞赛”按钮来对删除进行竞赛。你可能也希望阅读我们的编辑介绍和指导写你的第一篇文章。
